abilities.title: Aetheric Resonance
abilities.description: Emits a harmonic frequency that can heal or rejuvenate living beings.

abilities.title: Illusory Mirage
abilities.description: Creates a convincing illusion to confuse or mislead its adversaries.

abilities.title: Elemental Command
abilities.description: Can summon and control elements of nature, such as wind or fire.

encounters.outcome: The Aetherwyrm healed the wounded village, but vanished before further interaction.

relatedLegends.title: The Awakening of the Aetherwyrm
relatedLegends.source: Ancient Scrolls of the Ethereal Highlands
